name: Wai Chung LEE
summary: A detail-oriented & dependable engineering professional with hands-on experience in ICS, PLC programming, & project coordination across the power & manufacturing sectors. Skilled in DCS/SCADA systems, C&I troubleshooting, & ICS upgrades that enhance plant performance & OT cybersecurity. Known for analytical thinking, root-cause analysis, & a proactive approach to solving technical challenges.

experience.title: General Operative
details: Supported operational efficiency by maintaining accurate inventory data for >2,000 items through SAP, ensuring data integrity across warehouse systems.
Performed root-cause analysis & documented findings on damaged goods to support process improvements in warehouse workflow.

experience.title: Engineer
experience.summary: Project Management, Process Control & Cyber Security Department
details: Led >20 PCCS projects in power stations, managing planning, budgeting & scheduling to ensure on-time delivery while meeting scope & company standards.
Delivered key initiatives enhancing OT cybersecurity & plant control performance in power stations, reducing cyber risk & protecting 7208MW of generation assets.
Monitored contractor performance & collaborated with O&M teams to achieve technical delivery, handover & integration into operations.
Supported procurement, technical tendering & justified project investments to senior management to secure funding & achieve the £8M annual CapEx target.

experience.title: System Engineer
details: Delivered ICS projects at 3 client sites, handling planning, tendering, PLC/SCADA upgrades & integration, system design, site survey & execution til handover.
Built strong client relationships through field-level involvement by identifying site operations & future EC&I project opportunities to support long-term collaboration.
Prepared key project documents, e.g. architecture diagrams, I/O lists, technical proposals, test plans, aligned with client specifications.
Coordinated system installation, FAT/SAT execution, end-user training & operational review.

experience.title: System Engineer Trainee
details: Upgraded & maintained Honeywell DCS to support 84,000T clinker production annually, overseeing system performance by instrumentation calibration & process data analysis.
Troubleshot C&I faults & coordinated with O&M teams to uphold system reliability, while supporting production requests, e.g. GUI optimisation & logic modifications.
Developed control logic & conducted T&C activities for refurbishment projects, covering new plant infrastructure & E&M systems upgrades.

experience.title: Process Control Engineer
details: Managed cement manufacturing operations in CCR using DCS, optimising manpower & system resources to enable timely decision-making & operational efficiency.
